name: Luneoids
description:
An unknown galaxy faces a new threat - the Luneoids, and its your job to help save its people...

Collect gold to purchase new ships and upgrades to help battle your way to victory. What will your high-score be?

Luneoids features multiple enemy's and ships - there's so much to explore!

Features:
  • Phone & tablet support
  • Endless waves of ever increasing enemy's
  • Over 10 in game items ships and upgrades
  • Realistic gravity system
